reviews.review: im still shit at this, but unlike other games the lack of preset hiding spots i.e. "hide under this desk and let them go past" forces players to use the objects on the map. the survivors are third person and the killers are first person, meaning survivors can hide behind objects and move around the killer while thinking about what they can see from their first person viewpoint, being careful not to expose themselves and sometimes being able to get up right next to the killer because they know what he can and cant see. it flips "you can run but you cant hide" into "you can hide but you cant run", im not saying this because im shit at getting away  from the killer(kinda), but you will be gifted with much more time than if you were to run to fix generators.

An sich ist das Spiel echt gut gelungen. Es gab ja lange Zeit noch Probleme mit vielen Bugs oder DCs. Das hat sich aber mittlerweile gelegt. Auch die Balance zwischen den 4 Survivorn und dem Killer ist gut wie selten durch die letzten updates. Zwei killer sollten noch verbessert werden, die Devs haben das aber schon angekÃ¼ndigt etwas zu tun. Bugs findet man keine gravierenden mehr und DCs sind eigtl kaum vorhanden wenn man nicht eine Internetleitung wie ein StÃ¼ck Schwarzbrot hat. Wenn sich allerdings jmd Ã¼berlegt, das Spiel zu holen um killer zu spielen, sollte sich das Ã¼berlegen. eingige aus ddf Community, hauptsÃ¤chlich Leute aus dem Survivor Bereich, sind extrem toxic und man kann, wenn man kein pro gamer ist, schnell mal als killer zun opfer werden. Ansonsten habe ich nur geringfÃ¼gige sachen zu bemÃ¤ngeln, wie bspw. das man sich mit der krankenschwester nicht Ã¼berall durchteleportieren kann. Aber alles in allem ist das Spiel wie es aktuell ist echt grÃ¶ÃŸtebteils geil.

It's a very fun game ruined by the low quality of the developers.

The largest issue by far is the matchmaking.
I do not understand how matchmaking new players with no perks(abilities) against people with 4 perks helps the game at all.
All it does is make new players quit before realising how fun this game is.

And even after realising how fun the game is, the experience is killed by bad mannered players.
Clearly, developers does not give a single damn about bad mannered players as they have done nothing about it.

It's a pity as the game itself is fun.

MAN OH MAN! Where to begin...â€¦.

Dead by daylight is a very interesting game. I came across it from my sister who has over 2,000 hours on record and let me play a little bit of it. At first I loved survivor it was the heartbeat and the rush of running. It was honestly something new but I wish I never tried killer. Once I played one game of killer I was instantly hooked! HA SEE WHAT I DID THERE? But soon after I hit rank 12 thing's changed. I noticed how easily I was run around a map pallet to pallet. Soon it dawned on me that unless survivor makes a mistake and I get a free hit. I would never actually catch them and by the time that I did I lost 3 or 4 generator's. At first I thought I was just bad at the game being relatively new but it began to happen every goddamn game. Then the toxic survivor's would teabag and blind you and not leave the game after the exit gates are open. Let that sink in for a second. THE EXIT GATES ARE OPEN BUT THE SURVIVOR'S ARE STILL IN THE GAME CLEASING TOTEM'S TEABAGGING AND LOOKING FOR EXTRA POINT'S. That right there summed up what the problem in dead by daylight. Killer's are too weak and have too many negative thing's put against them. Not to mention not feared in the slightest. Playing survivor just isn't fun when it's the same thing every single game. It's usually hillbilly or nurse because of there quick downing potential. It's a real shame but even after all of the updates to the game. Killer's are still too weak. It's not the skill of the killer anymore when you can run to a pallet still even though they supposedly fixed that in one of the earlier patches. Not to mention being looped around one until your at the point of literally screaming. And now killer's have to run certain perks to try and counter a mechanic that shouldn't have even been in the game in the first place. Survivor isn't fun because it's all the same killer's and watching one of your teammate's loop the killer into 3 generator's is sad to see. I don't even take the game seriously anymore killer is just a bad joke and survivor is too strong. I PURPOSLY MAKE A MISTAKE just so the killer can get a hook in at least. Watching the killer rage quit is even worse. After the developer got his ass kicked by those Korean's he still doesn't play his own game and doesn't know how to balance it. I just hope in one of the future updates they balance the game out like it should have been. Until then this game is gonna run out of killer's soon and it'll just be a bad meme on steam. If you want to get looped for a thousand year's play killer in DBD and see for yourself. If you want to make the killer quit and be a toxic survivor who think's killers are OP play SWF. Bring all purple flashlight's and decisive strikes. Take care DBD a failed product of the system. The biased one sided system.

EDIT: ITS GARBAGE OKAY

After playing more than 100h, I decided to review this piece.
Game is great, concept is great, it is done good but not perfect.
Rage after few camping killers - guaranteed.
To be clear, camping is less common on higher surv/killer ranks, i guess people start understanding how to play the game and how to not make other people rage quit (still happenes a lot, especially if someone missed DS).
I always wanted this game so maybe thats why i am so optimistic. 
I still think it is not worth full price and it is better to wait for sale.
Expansions are not too expensive which is a big plus, cos shrine of secrets is a little bitch and sometimes it is garbage. 
New level system and new cosmetics are good.
A lot of offering, perks etc makes most of the games unique.

I recommend this game as long as you are not 1s tilt master.

game sucks. don't buy.
not a joke review, DO. NOT. BUY.

The balancing in this game is UNREAL. I have played both as survivor and killer, and playing as a killer can be hard however they are still overpowered.

 This is why: Many killers can down a survivor after one-shot, teleport, and are pretty much immune to a lot due to perks.

My suggestions:
-Hex: Ruin needs to be removed, or the totem that its activated with needs to be more easily visible.
-If a survivor can be downed in one-shot and many killers can quiet their terror radius, then survivors need to have actions that easily make them escape the killer after a single action. I am not talking about flashlights that barely work or pulling down vaults. I am talking about either making it so there is a VERY SMALL skill check during wiggle that can allow them to escape as an example. That's totally fair.
-A killer teleporting needs to be removed or there needs to be a couple second warning sign that it's happening like Freddy teleporting to a generator. The hag and spirit are the worst culprits of this.

That is all, thank you.

The new patch is just awful. Pallets are still completely unsafe. Killers get a free hit across a pallet stun. Vaults get cancelled mid-vault by doctor. Flashlight blinds are now impossible. 3 second delay after unhooking before you can start healing. On top of all that killers get lag advantage. 

I will not be playing this game until the devs fix these issues, and I encourage all other survivors to stop playing to make the killer queues as long as possible.

I have around 112 hours on the game atm, when I first began playing the game it was my favorite game. But recently, that is not the case. Playing survivor has been near impossible recently, the killer buffs and survivor nerfs have ruined the game. I'm not saying that they made it too hard to play survivor,  I'm saying that these updates have awakened a new era of camping and tunneling that has made it too toxic. They can't favor killers because they will loose half of their player community. And if these patches continue to favor killers, they will lose their community entirely. But besides that, the game has an interesting concept and can be fun at times, if you aren't in a lobby with someone that decides to ruin the game for you. Saddly, that is what happens most of the time.

This game is really good sure it has some bugs in it but what games dosen't there are two types of people in the Dead By Daylight community there are the chill/cool ones and there are the ones with a high level of sodium chloride and feel like they should win every time if you ever meet these type of ppl and you will ignore them

A lot of the negativity in the reviews is by people who cant take a loss - the point of this game isn't always to win the match, its to get the sweet satisfaction of knowing you made someone you've never met piss themselves with fear. 10/10 recommend.
Pretty fun game with friends.Beware of the camping Leatherfaces with insidious

This game is heavily favored towards the killer no matter what ppl say bc i have played both survivor and killer and its a 50/50 with survivor but as killer u always kill at least 3 ppl bc every time i have played killer it was so easy and ppl said the nurse was hard to play and i played her for my first time and downed everybody within the first minute. Das letzte Update ist einfach ein Witz. Die Killer wurden mit den letzten updates so viel stÃ¤rker gemacht, weil alle immer wegen swf rum heulen. Einerseits ist es verstÃ¤ndlich, da du als killer gegen eine full swf lobby fast keine chance hast aber andererseits ist es als solo spieler echt viel zu schwer geworden alleine schon zu entkommen, da man den anderen spielern meistens komplett egal ist. Also fÃ¼r einen solo spieler ist das game nicht (mehr) wirklich zum empfehlen. Das Game hat aber noch viele andere Probleme: - Das reporten von Spielern ist total unnÃ¶tig, scheint den developern einfach egal zu sein.(Nur gut fÃ¼rs Gewissen)  - Fast jeder killer ist am campen oder tunneln, da es eh nicht bestaft wird. - Mutiges spielen, wie zb Taschenlampe nutzen, teammate aus dem keller befreien o. Ã¤. wird 0 belohnt -Neue dlc killer sind anfangs viel zu stark und werden erst monate danach generft... Und vieles mehr. Einfach nur schade um das Game!

This game's community will NEVER call this game balanced.

And that's because it isn't. Not every game, at least.

There are 1 time use items and perks you can get by leveling other characters. So when a killer uses 2 ultra rare add-ons for their weapon + an ultra rare offering ON TOP of top-tier meta perks, the game is going to feel unbalanced when you're low level.

Just accept that you won't survive every round and you're already miles ahead of everyone else.

If you're the overly competitive type, you will have an autistic episode of screeching playing this game.

So if you're that kind of person, please record yourself and post it to youtube so future employers can see you have no control over your basic emotions.

To kill or be killed... that is the question.

You can choose between a killer or a survivor in this game. The main point is to repair all the generators and escape from the killer's wrath, or the other way around it.
